author: Don Ddbizz
content:
hey ya'll wanting to start this journey I'm 66 any other older people here? Like to here opinions at this age
WOW! didn't expect all of the replies and all the folks my age. My concerns were damage I could do at this age, but that doesn'took like a problem I'm starting this weekend

replies.content: I AM 67, Been on it 5 years and it is amazing, what do you wanna know?
Martin Applegate example of your breakfast, lunch and dinner, please.

Nkululeko Dwayi I only eat twice a day. I fast from 8 pm to noon the next. My first meal is around noon, almost always 3 eggs and bacon or sausage. Dinner is whatever meat I buy on sale like Ribeye steak, 80/20 hamburger, shrimp, pork, cod, salmon, sc‚Ä¶ See more
I‚Äôm 71. Starting soon.

I am also 66 and started this journey two weeks ago. My husband has been carnivore for two months and I saw his energy level and skin improve. He was losing weight. Well since I have been carnivore, my A1C has greatly improved. Dropped from 7 to 5.‚Ä¶ See more
68, but fairly new.
I'm 58, this diet is helping me heal
Michael Groves what are you healing from ?

Karen Soane skin, stomach, BP, diabetes, etc.
Diabetes normal now as is BP. Skin and stomach improving.
69 been carnivore for almost a year this September

Elaine Sangiolo I just turned 70 and I need help! I have been doing it for about a month. I don‚Äôt think I eat enough, the meat makes me so satiated I don‚Äôt want anything else . Someone please help me! Thanks
Carole Grunsky how is your blood work? What data are you using to gauge improvement? Do you want to be hungry? Close your eyes and listen to your body, how are you feeling today?
Carole Grunsky pm me
68 . Keto then carnivore for a year. Bloodwork shows it. Plus weight loss. 70 lb so far. About 20-25 to go. Feel great!!
Diane Guernsey Neff did you notice a big change in energy or weight loss when you switched from keto to carnivore?

59 and my husband is 60. Been on this since January. We feel amazing! Our blood work is better than ever. Our energy and motivation to get up and do things makes us feel like we're in our 20's. The best advise I can give is to just do it! It ma‚Ä¶ See more
62 here
68. I‚Äôm in my third week.
I‚Äôm 57 just starting have seen my son and DIL succeed and I want to get off my diabetes meds and heal my fatty liver.
I'm 68. Been keto for 1 years. No exercise cause I'm handicapped. I've lost 60 lbs. Now just trying to maintain. I'm off all my medications. Just one vit+50 a day. Feel great
I did carnivore for 2 months. Couldn't handle it. Didn't lose weight and didn't feel any different. Keto is much better. Some days I still find myself eating carnivore. So I just change it up
The proper human diet is best at any age.

59 here. I've had Multiple Sclerosis for 38 year's. Started this many months ago to help with inflammation and severe pain from this disease. This lifestyle has got me off of morphine and I no longer need to take 3 high blood pressure medicines. My deb‚Ä¶ See more

Nanci Heir I have MS too. I've been carnivore since January. I'm 51. Feel best I have in over 20 years. Do you eat eggs and dairy? I am tempted to go strict lion diet for awhile to see if I get even more healing. I'm off all meds but still need energy ‚Ä¶ See more

Look up the personal story of Tim Noakes

Yes me though I never admit it lol. Im 8 days in and have lost 10lb.
It's great you dont have to think of meals to prepare just throw a piece of meat/fish or eggs in a pan.
GOOD LUCK X
I am 60, post menopausal and hypothyroid. I have lost 68 pounds, my 1 year anniversary is 8/28.
I'm 70, carnivore since Sept 22, really strict since Nov 22 when I gave up alcohol & dairy. Have lost 50lbs & Psoriasis greatly improved....feel the best I have felt in many years!

I'm 64, hubby is 65. I am doing this woe, trying to convince him to. He does support my efforts, though, and does not try to undermine me. I lost 10 lbs 1st month, then cut out dairy. My weakness is variety but if you look, you can find carnivore recipes.

Renee Ilse
Marie Emmerich has a great cookbook, The Carnivore Cookbook. Lots of variety. I highly recommend it!
Theresa Sonnier Copperthite Thank you. A friend actually sent me a cookbook for carnivore beginners! And yt has lots of possibilities!
Renee Ilse Oh good! I ordered this one and I‚Äôm glad I did!
Renee Ilse I find variety in the meat. For dinner hotdog, trout and hamburger patty
Nancy Auvenshine Bellwood Yes, I try to di that also. Tuna salad w/hb patty, boiled eggs or egg salad, etc.
Renee Ilse different textures and color makes a meal more interesting.
70. Started in February and feel amazing! Getting younger everyday ü§£ü§£
66 here been carnivore for 4 months lost 35 lbs , feel great
im 68 and have lost 50lbs and put diabetes into remission since end of January on this way. What are your goals? are you doing this for weight loss?
